testcase.query: #set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO2.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #foreach( $shipmentManifestVO in $uldManifestVO.manifestShipmentDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT MFTPCS, BDPPCS from oprsegshp where DOCOWRIDR = '$!{shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}' AND MSTDOCNUM='$!{shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND DUPNUM ='$!{shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND SEQNUM = '$!{shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND CMPCOD='$!{shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO2.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${uldManifestVO.uldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD=SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD =SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD =SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD =SHP.DEFLOCCOD);") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO2.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #foreach( $shipmentManifestVO in $uldManifestVO.manifestShipmentDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, LOCCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, STUCOD, LOCPCS, TXNPCS FROM WHSOPRSHPLOC WHERE CMPCOD = '${shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}' AND MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND DUPNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND SEQNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO2.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #foreach( $shipmentManifestVO in $uldManifestVO.manifestShipmentDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, AVLPCS FROM OPRARPSHP WHERE CMPCOD = '${shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}' AND MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND DUPNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND SEQNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO2.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #foreach( $shipmentManifestVO in $uldManifestVO.manifestShipmentDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT MST.SHPPFX,MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD,MST.STDPCS,ARPSHP.AVLPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.MFTPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)MFTPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.OFLPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)OFLPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.BDPPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)BDPPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.RCVPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)RCVPCS, ARPSHP.MFTPCS ARPMFTPCS,ARPSHP.BDPPCS ARPBDPPCS FROM OPRSEGSHP SEGSHP INNER JOIN OPRARPSHP ARPSHP ON SEGSHP.CMPCOD = ARPSHP.CMPCOD AND SEGSHP.DOCOWRIDR = ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR AND SEGSHP.DUPNUM = ARPSHP.DUPNUM AND SEGSHP.SEQNUM = ARPSHP.SEQNUM AND SEGSHP.MSTDOCNUM = ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM INNER JOIN OPRSHPMST MST ON MST.CMPCOD = ARPSHP.CMPCOD AND MST.MSTDOCNUM = ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM AND MST.SEQNUM = ARPSHP.SEQNUM AND MST.DUPNUM = ARPSHP.DUPNUM AND MST.DOCOWRIDR = ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR WHERE ARPSHP.CMPCOD = '${shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}' AND ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND ARPSHP.SEQNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND ARPSHP.DUPNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end #end $data

SELECT ULD.CLSFLG ULDCLSFLG, ULD.ULDNUM FROM OPRARPIMPFLT IMP JOIN OPRULDDTL ULD ON IMP.CMPCOD = ULD.CMPCOD AND IMP.FLTCARIDR = ULD.FLTCARIDR AND IMP.FLTNUM = ULD.FLTNUM AND IMP.FLTSEQNUM = ULD.FLTSEQNUM AND IMP.LEGSERNUM = ULD.LEGSERNUM JOIN SHRUSEARPPAR PAR ON ULD.CMPCOD = PAR.CMPCOD AND PAR.PARCOD = 'operation.flthandling.triggerpointforuldrelease' AND PAR.ARPCOD = IMP.ARPCOD WHERE PAR.PARVAL ='CLSFLT' AND IMP.CLSFLG ='Y' AND IMP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND IMP.FLTCARIDR = '${VO1.carrierId}' AND IMP.FLTNUM = '${VO1.flightNumber}' AND IMP.FLTSEQNUM = '${VO1.flightSequenceNumber}' AND IMP.LEGSERNUM = '${VO1.legSerialNumber}' AND IMP.ARPCOD = '${VO1.airportCode}';

SELECT ULD.CLSFLG ULDCLSFLG, ULD.ULDNUM FROM OprarpIMPflT IMP JOIN Oprulddtl Uld ON IMP.Cmpcod = Uld.Cmpcod AND IMP.Fltcaridr = Uld.Fltcaridr AND IMP.Fltnum = Uld.Fltnum AND IMP.Fltseqnum = Uld.Fltseqnum AND IMP.LEGSERNUM = Uld.LEGSERNUM JOIN SHRUSEARPPAR PAR ON ULD.CMPCOD = PAR.CMPCOD AND PAR.PARCOD = 'operation.flthandling.triggerpointforuldrelease' AND PAR.ARPCOD = IMP.ARPCOD WHERE PAR.PARVAL ='CLSFLT' AND IMP.CLSFLG ='Y' AND IMP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND IMP.Fltcaridr = '${VO1.carrierId}' AND IMP.Fltnum = '${VO1.flightNumber}' AND IMP.Fltseqnum = '${VO1.flightSequenceNumber}' AND IMP.LEGSERNUM = '${VO1.legSerialNumber}' AND IMP.ARPCOD = '${VO1.airportCode}';

#set($data="") #foreach( $breakdownDetail in $!{VO2.breakdownDetails}) #set( $query= "SELECT SUM(AVLPCS) TOTAVLPCS, SUM(LOCPCS) TOTLOCPCS, MAX(ROL.USRTYP) USRTYP FROM OPRARPSHP ARP LEFT OUTER JOIN WHSOPRSHPLOC LOC ON ARP.CMPCOD = LOC.CMPCOD AND ARP.DOCOWRIDR = LOC.DOCOWRIDR AND ARP.MSTDOCNUM = LOC.MSTDOCNUM AND ARP.SEQNUM = LOC.SEQNUM AND ARP.DUPNUM = LOC.DUPNUM LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMUSRMST USR ON ARP.CMPCOD = USR.CMPCOD AND ARP.LSTUPDUSR = USR.USRCOD LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMROLGRPMST ROL ON USR.CMPCOD = ROL.CMPCOD AND USR.DEFROLGRP = ROL.ROLGRPCOD WHERE ARP.CMPCOD = '${breakdownDetail.companyCode}' AND ARP.DOCOWRIDR = '${breakdownDetail.ownerId}' AND ARP.MSTDOCNUM ='${breakdownDetail.masterDocumentNumber}' AND ARP.DUPNUM = '${breakdownDetail.duplicateNumber}' AND ARP.SEQNUM ='${breakdownDetail.sequenceNumber}' GROUP BY ARP.CMPCOD, ARP.DOCOWRIDR, ARP.MSTDOCNUM, ARP.SEQNUM, ARP.DUPNUM;") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data
SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, STUTYPNAM, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST WHERE CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND STUCOD = '${VO1.uldNumber}';

SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${VO1.uldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD = SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD = SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD = SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD = SHP.CURLOCCOD);

SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${VO1.uldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD=SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD =SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD =SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD =SHP.DEFLOCCOD);

SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, LOCCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, STUCOD, LOCPCS, TXNPCS FROM WHSOPRSHPLOC WHERE (ARPCOD,WHSCOD,STUCOD) IN (SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, STUCOD FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${VO1.uldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD=SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD =SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD =SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD =SHP.CURLOCCOD ));

#set($data="") #set($shipmentBreakdownVOs=$!{VO1.breakdownDetails}) #foreach( $shipmentBreakdownVO in $shipmentBreakdownVOs) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, LOCCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, STUCOD, LOCPCS, TXNPCS FROM WHSOPRSHPLOC WHERE CMPCOD = '${shipmentBreakdownVO.companyCode}' AND MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentBreakdownVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND DUPNUM = '${shipmentBreakdownVO.duplicateNumber}' AND SEQNUM = '${shipmentBreakdownVO.sequenceNumber}' AND DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentBreakdownVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

SELECT ULD.CLSFLG ULDCLSFLG, ULD.ULDNUM FROM OPRSEGULD SEG JOIN OPRULDDTL ULD ON SEG.CMPCOD = ULD.CMPCOD AND SEG.FLTCARIDR = ULD.FLTCARIDR AND SEG.FLTNUM = ULD.FLTNUM AND SEG.FLTSEQNUM = ULD.FLTSEQNUM JOIN SHRUSEARPPAR PAR ON ULD.CMPCOD = PAR.CMPCOD AND PAR.PARCOD = 'operation.flthandling.triggerpointforuldrelease' WHERE PAR.PARVAL ='BDN' AND PAR.ARPCOD = '${VO1.airportCode}' AND SEG.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND SEG.FLTCARIDR = '${VO1.carrierId}' AND SEG.FLTNUM = '${VO1.flightNumber}' AND SEG.FLTSEQNUM = '${VO1.flightSequenceNumber}' AND SEG.SEGSERNUM = '${VO1.segmentSerialNumber}' AND ULD.LEGSERNUM = '${VO1.legSerialNumber}';
SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, STUTYPNAM, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST WHERE CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND STUCOD = '${VO1.toUldNumber}';

SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${VO1.toUldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD = SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD = SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD = SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD = SHP.CURLOCCOD );

SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${VO1.toUldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD=SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD =SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD =SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD =SHP.DEFLOCCOD );

SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, LOCCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, STUCOD, LOCPCS, TXNPCS FROM WHSOPRSHPLOC WHERE (ARPCOD,WHSCOD,STUCOD) IN (SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, STUCOD FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${VO1.toUldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD=SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD =SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD =SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD =SHP.CURLOCCOD ));

#set($data="") #set($reassignShipmentVOs=$!{VO1.reassignedShipments}) #foreach( $reassignShipmentVO in $reassignShipmentVOs) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, LOCCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, STUCOD, LOCPCS, TXNPCS FROM WHSOPRSHPLOC WHERE CMPCOD = '${reassignShipmentVO.companyCode}' AND MSTDOCNUM = '${reassignShipmentVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND DUPNUM = '${reassignShipmentVO.duplicateNumber}' AND SEQNUM = '${reassignShipmentVO.sequenceNumber}' AND DOCOWRIDR = '${reassignShipmentVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO1.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #foreach( $shipmentManifestVO in $uldManifestVO.manifestShipmentDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, AVLPCS FROM OPRARPSHP WHERE CMPCOD = '${shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}' AND MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND DUPNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND SEQNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO1.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #foreach( $shipmentManifestVO in $uldManifestVO.manifestShipmentDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT MST.SHPPFX,MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD,MST.STDPCS,ARPSHP.AVLPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.MFTPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)MFTPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.OFLPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)OFLPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.BDPPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)BDPPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.RCVPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)RCVPCS, ARPSHP.MFTPCS ARPMFTPCS,ARPSHP.BDPPCS ARPBDPPCS FROM OPRSEGSHP SEGSHP INNER JOIN OPRARPSHP ARPSHP ON SEGSHP.CMPCOD = ARPSHP.CMPCOD AND SEGSHP.DOCOWRIDR = ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR AND SEGSHP.DUPNUM = ARPSHP.DUPNUM AND SEGSHP.SEQNUM = ARPSHP.SEQNUM AND SEGSHP.MSTDOCNUM = ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM INNER JOIN OPRSHPMST MST ON MST.CMPCOD = ARPSHP.CMPCOD AND MST.MSTDOCNUM = ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM AND MST.SEQNUM = ARPSHP.SEQNUM AND MST.DUPNUM = ARPSHP.DUPNUM AND MST.DOCOWRIDR = ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR WHERE ARPSHP.CMPCOD = '${shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}' AND ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND ARPSHP.SEQNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND ARPSHP.DUPNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO1.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, STUTYPNAM, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST WHERE CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND STUCOD = '${uldManifestVO.uldNumber}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO1.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${uldManifestVO.uldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD=SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD =SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD =SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD =SHP.DEFLOCCOD);") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO1.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, LOCCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, STUCOD, LOCPCS, TXNPCS FROM WHSOPRSHPLOC WHERE (ARPCOD,WHSCOD,STUCOD) IN (SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, STUCOD FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${uldManifestVO.uldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD=SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD =SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD =SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD =SHP.CURLOCCOD ));") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO1.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #foreach( $shipmentManifestVO in $uldManifestVO.manifestShipmentDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, LOCCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, STUCOD, LOCPCS, TXNPCS FROM WHSOPRSHPLOC WHERE CMPCOD = '${shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}' AND MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND DUPNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND SEQNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO1.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #foreach( $shipmentManifestVO in $uldManifestVO.manifestShipmentDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, AVLPCS FROM OPRARPSHP WHERE CMPCOD = '${shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}' AND MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND DUPNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND SEQNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end #end $data

#set($data="") #set($uldManifestVOs=$!{VO1.freightDetailsVO.manifestUldDetails}) #foreach( $uldManifestVO in $uldManifestVOs) #foreach( $shipmentManifestVO in $uldManifestVO.manifestShipmentDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT MST.SHPPFX,MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD,MST.STDPCS,ARPSHP.AVLPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.MFTPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)MFTPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.OFLPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)OFLPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.BDPPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)BDPPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.RCVPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)RCVPCS, ARPSHP.MFTPCS ARPMFTPCS,ARPSHP.BDPPCS ARPBDPPCS FROM OPRSEGSHP SEGSHP INNER JOIN OPRARPSHP ARPSHP ON SEGSHP.CMPCOD = ARPSHP.CMPCOD AND SEGSHP.DOCOWRIDR = ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR AND SEGSHP.DUPNUM = ARPSHP.DUPNUM AND SEGSHP.SEQNUM = ARPSHP.SEQNUM AND SEGSHP.MSTDOCNUM = ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM INNER JOIN OPRSHPMST MST ON MST.CMPCOD = ARPSHP.CMPCOD AND MST.MSTDOCNUM = ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM AND MST.SEQNUM = ARPSHP.SEQNUM AND MST.DUPNUM = ARPSHP.DUPNUM AND MST.DOCOWRIDR = ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR WHERE ARPSHP.CMPCOD = '${shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}' AND ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND ARPSHP.SEQNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND ARPSHP.DUPNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end #end $data

#set($data="") #set($offloadDetails=$!{VO1.offloadDetails}) #foreach( $offloadDetailVO in $offloadDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, STUTYPNAM, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST WHERE CMPCOD = '${offloadDetailVO.companyCode}' AND STUCOD = '${offloadDetailVO.uldNumber}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

#set($data="") #set($offloadDetails=$!{VO1.offloadDetails}) #foreach( $offloadDetailVO in $offloadDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${offloadDetailVO.uldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${offloadDetailVO.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD = SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD = SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD = SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD = SHP.CURLOCCOD);") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

#set($data="") #set($offloadDetails=$!{VO1.offloadDetails}) #foreach( $offloadDetailVO in $offloadDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, STUCOD, WHSCOD, DEFLOCCOD, DEFWHSCOD, CURLOCCOD, CURWHSCOD, OCPSTA, TXNBLKFLG FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${offloadDetailVO.uldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${offloadDetailVO.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD=SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD =SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD =SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD =SHP.DEFLOCCOD);") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

#set($data="") #set($offloadDetails=$!{VO1.offloadDetails}) #foreach( $offloadDetailVO in $offloadDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, LOCCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, STUCOD, LOCPCS, TXNPCS FROM WHSOPRSHPLOC WHERE (ARPCOD,WHSCOD,STUCOD) IN (SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, STUCOD FROM WHSSTUMST SHP WHERE SHP.STUCOD = '${offloadDetailVO.uldNumber}' AND SHP.CMPCOD = '${offloadDetailVO.companyCode}' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHSLOCMST LOC WHERE LOC.CMPCOD=SHP.CMPCOD AND LOC.WHSCOD =SHP.WHSCOD AND LOC.ARPCOD =SHP.ARPCOD AND LOC.LOCCOD =SHP.CURLOCCOD ));") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

#set($data="") #set($offloadDetails=$!{VO1.offloadDetails}) #foreach( $offloadDetailVO in $offloadDetails) #set( $query= "SELECT ARPCOD, WHSCOD, LOCCOD, DOCOWRIDR, MSTDOCNUM, DUPNUM, SEQNUM, STUCOD, LOCPCS, TXNPCS FROM WHSOPRSHPLOC WHERE CMPCOD = '${shipmentManifestVO.companyCode}' AND MSTDOCNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.masterDocumentNumber}' AND DUPNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.duplicateNumber}' AND SEQNUM = '${shipmentManifestVO.sequenceNumber}' AND DOCOWRIDR = '${shipmentManifestVO.ownerId}';") #set( $data= $data + $query) #end $data

SELECT MST.SHPPFX,MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD,MST.STDPCS,ARPSHP.AVLPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.MFTPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)MFTPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.OFLPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)OFLPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.BDPPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)BDPPCS, SUM(SEGSHP.RCVPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD)RCVPCS, SUM(SHPLOC.LOCPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD,SHPLOC.WHSCOD)LOCPCS, SUM(SHPLOC.TXNPCS)OVER(PARTITION BY MST.MSTDOCNUM,MST.DOCNUM,MST.DOCOWRIDR,MST.SEQNUM,MST.DUPNUM,ARPSHP.ARPCOD,SHPLOC.WHSCOD)TXNPCS, EXPFLT.FLTOPRSTA,ARPSHP.MFTPCS ARPMFTPCS,ARPSHP.BDPPCS ARPBDPPCS,SHPLOC.WHSCOD,EXPFLT.FLTCARCOD,EXPFLT.FLTNUM,EXPFLT.FLTDAT,EXPFLT.FLTCARIDR FROM OPRARPEXPFLT EXPFLT INNER JOIN FLTOPRSEG FLTSEG ON FLTSEG.FLTSEQNUM = EXPFLT.FLTSEQNUM AND FLTSEG.FLTNUM = EXPFLT.FLTNUM AND FLTSEG.FLTCARIDR = EXPFLT.FLTCARIDR AND FLTSEG.CMPCOD = EXPFLT.CMPCOD AND FLTSEG.SEGORG = EXPFLT.ARPCOD INNER JOIN OPRSEGSHP SEGSHP ON SEGSHP.CMPCOD = EXPFLT.CMPCOD AND SEGSHP.FLTCARIDR = EXPFLT.FLTCARIDR AND SEGSHP.FLTNUM = EXPFLT.FLTNUM AND SEGSHP.FLTSEQNUM = EXPFLT.FLTSEQNUM AND SEGSHP.SEGSERNUM = FLTSEG.SEGSERNUM AND SEGSHP.MFTPCS > 0 INNER JOIN OPRARPSHP ARPSHP ON EXPFLT.ARPCOD = ARPSHP.ARPCOD AND SEGSHP.CMPCOD = ARPSHP.CMPCOD AND SEGSHP.DOCOWRIDR = ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR AND SEGSHP.DUPNUM = ARPSHP.DUPNUM AND SEGSHP.SEQNUM = ARPSHP.SEQNUM AND SEGSHP.MSTDOCNUM = ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM AND ARPSHP.AVLPCS = 0 INNER JOIN OPRSHPMST MST ON MST.CMPCOD = ARPSHP.CMPCOD AND MST.MSTDOCNUM = ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM AND MST.SEQNUM = ARPSHP.SEQNUM AND MST.DUPNUM = ARPSHP.DUPNUM AND MST.DOCOWRIDR = ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR INNER JOIN WHSOPRSHPLOC SHPLOC ON SHPLOC.ARPCOD = ARPSHP.ARPCOD AND SHPLOC.CMPCOD = ARPSHP.CMPCOD AND SHPLOC.DOCOWRIDR = ARPSHP.DOCOWRIDR AND SHPLOC.DUPNUM = ARPSHP.DUPNUM AND SHPLOC.SEQNUM = ARPSHP.SEQNUM AND SHPLOC.MSTDOCNUM = ARPSHP.MSTDOCNUM WHERE EXPFLT.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND EXPFLT.FLTOPRSTA = 'F' AND EXPFLT.FLTDAT = '${VO1.flightDate}' AND EXPFLT.FLTCARCOD = '${VO1.carrierCode}' AND EXPFLT.ARPCOD = '${VO1.airportCode}' AND EXPFLT.FLTNUM = '${VO1.flightNumber}' AND EXPFLT.FLTCARIDR = '${VO1.carrierId}' ORDER BY SHPLOC.SHPCINTIM DESC;

SELECT ULD.CLSFLG ULDCLSFLG, ULD.ULDNUM FROM OPRSEGULD SEG JOIN OPRULDDTL ULD ON SEG.CMPCOD = ULD.CMPCOD AND SEG.FLTCARIDR = ULD.FLTCARIDR AND SEG.FLTNUM = ULD.FLTNUM AND SEG.FLTSEQNUM = ULD.FLTSEQNUM JOIN SHRUSEARPPAR PAR ON ULD.CMPCOD = PAR.CMPCOD AND PAR.PARCOD = 'operation.flthandling.triggerpointforuldrelease' WHERE PAR.PARVAL ='BDNCPL' AND PAR.ARPCOD = '${VO1.airportCode}' AND SEG.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND SEG.FLTCARIDR = '${VO1.carrierId}' AND SEG.FLTNUM = '${VO1.flightNumber}' AND SEG.FLTSEQNUM = '${VO1.flightSequenceNumber}' AND SEG.SEGSERNUM = '${VO1.segmentSerialNumber}' AND ULD.LEGSERNUM = '${VO1.legSerialNumber}';

SELECT ULD.CLSFLG ULDCLSFLG, ULD.ULDNUM FROM OPRARPIMPFLT IMP JOIN OPRULDDTL ULD ON IMP.CMPCOD = ULD.CMPCOD AND IMP.FLTCARIDR = ULD.FLTCARIDR AND IMP.FLTNUM = ULD.FLTNUM AND IMP.FLTSEQNUM = ULD.FLTSEQNUM AND IMP.LEGSERNUM = ULD.LEGSERNUM JOIN SHRUSEARPPAR PAR ON ULD.CMPCOD = PAR.CMPCOD AND PAR.PARCOD = 'operation.flthandling.triggerpointforuldrelease' AND PAR.ARPCOD = IMP.ARPCOD WHERE PAR.PARVAL ='ARR' AND IMP.FLTSTA ='A' AND IMP.CMPCOD = '${VO1.companyCode}' AND IMP.FLTCARIDR = '${VO1.carrierId}' AND IMP.FLTNUM = '${VO1.flightNumber}' AND IMP.FLTSEQNUM = '${VO1.flightSequenceNumber}' AND IMP.LEGSERNUM = '${VO1.legSerialNumber}' AND IMP.ARPCOD = '${VO1.airportCode}';
